channel.title: [667] Making A Shop take Points?
channel.description:
The title is pretty much self explanitory. I set up my shop, buy sendinfo, my buy, my prices, and it wil not take the points. My points are prestigepoints.
When i click on the item to see the cost, it says the item id pointed out in shop (sphinx Tokens),
[b]How can i make it so it will take player.prestigePoints[/b]?
